page.title: 17HOTELS IN BRODICK
page.content: Hotels and boarding houses line the main shore road and vary in size and standard as one would expect. Many school children's parents are involved in the hotel business since they either own, run or work in hotels during the holiday season. The busiest time is from Easter until September. Schools presently amass local holidays together to have 2 weeks holiday in October to accommodate those who take their holidays when the tourist trade declines. The larger hotels can accommodate about 60 people and are open to non-residents since the short journey from the mainland encourages day trippers. Cold stores, several giant freezers and storerooms are common though provisions do come weekly from the mainland.
